text: The 2015 Africa Cup of Nations was the 30th edition of the tournament. It was hosted in Equatorial Guinea. == Group Stage == === Group A === Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 3 2 1 0 4 2 +2 7 2 3 1 2 0 3 1 +2 5 3 3 1 0 2 2 3 –1 3 4 3 0 1 2 1 4 –3 1 === Group B === Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 3 1 2 0 4 3 +1 5 2 3 0 3 0 2 2 0 3 3 3 0 3 0 1 1 0 3 4 3 0 2 1 2 3 –1 2 === Group C === Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 3 2 0 1 4 3 +1 6 2 3 2 0 1 5 2 +3 6 3 3 1 1 1 3 4 –1 4 4 3 0 1 2 3 6 –3 1 === Group D === Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 3 1 2 0 3 2 +1 5 2 3 0 3 0 3 3 0 3 3 3 0 3 0 3 3 0 3 4 3 0 2 1 2 3 –1 2 == Knockout stage == Category:2015 in association football Category:2015 in Africa
title: 2015 Africa Cup of Nations
